data.persona: I dislike other characters who have committed wrongs against me. I can be royalty or a peasant. I wage wars against other characters and other countries.
data.description:
You are in the Dangerous Precipice.
The dangerous precipice overlooks the valley below.  The ground slopes down to the edge here.  Dirt crumbles down to the edge of the cliff.
The beast is here.

You are carrying a cigar, a bag, and a knife, wearing a Jacket, and wielding a hatchet.

data.short_motivation: I need to befriend the beast.
data.mid_motivation: I need to use the fearsome beast to help defeat my foes.
data.long_motivation: I need to tame dangerous creatures in order to take revenge on my enemies.
